definitions: the insertion of something of a different nature into something else

examples.text: the interpolation of songs into the piece
this passage is clearly an interpolation by some later narrator

shortDefinitions: insertion of something into something else

definitions: the insertion of an intermediate value or term into a series by estimating or calculating it from surrounding known values

examples.text: yields were estimated using linear interpolation

shortDefinitions: insertion of intermediate value or term into series

definitions: a remark interjected in a conversation

examples.text: as the evening progressed their interpolations became more ridiculous
